ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 300
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, it is annoying that they decided to lengthen our recovery phase for newly memorized songs considering we already take 10x longer to memorize than
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 31 Aug 1999 flash@... wrote:
> Here is a little trick in this same vain that some of the younger
> SongCasters may not know..
>
> When you memorize a song, you have that 'You have not recovered' phase
> that you can't USE the newly memeorized song until it 'pops' into view.
> Start and stop any other song to cut that process short, thus making it
> available immediately. Really helps when you are in a crunch and NEED that
> song you just learned!

Yes, it is annoying that they decided to lengthen our
"recovery" phase for newly memorized songs considering we
already take 10x longer to memorize than any other class. A
lot of these delays are client-side though, which really makes
me question the robustness of the game to hacking.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
